Package resources.shaders

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlinnPhongShader
    This shader can draw meshes and splines by using the Blinn-Phong shading.
    EnvironmentShader  
    Shader
    This abstract class is the base all of the shaders.
    ShadowShader
    This shader can render the shadow map.
    SkyBoxShader
    This shader can draw a skybox.
    SolidColorShader
    This shader can render Renderabes by drawing them with one color.
    TexturedQuadShader
    This shader can render an image to a quad.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Shader.ShaderStage
    Shader stage.
